description.value: If Acererak takes radiant damage, regeneration doesn't function until the end of its next turn.

Fear

Aura 2

Enemies within the aura take a -2 penalty to attack rolls.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Necrotic

Standard

Ranged 20

+31 vs Reflex; 3d8+8 necrotic damage.

At-Will ✦ Necrotic

Standard

Acererak makes a shadow ray attack and a drain soul attack.

At-Will

Standard

Ranged 10

+31 vs Reflex; the target is dazed and restrained (save ends both). First Failed Saving Throw: The target is instead stunned and restrained (save ends both). Second Failed Saving Throw: The target dies, and its soul is trapped in one of Acererak's soul gems until Acererak is destroyed.

At-Will ✦ Gaze, Necrotic

Minor, At-Will

Ranged 20

+31 vs Will; the target takes ongoing 10 psychic damage and is slowed (save ends both).

Recharge 6

Standard

Area burst 3 within 10

+31 vs Reflex; 3d8+8 cold, fire, lightning, and thunder damage, and the target is stunned until the end of Acererak's next turn.

At-Will ✦ Fear, Necrotic

Immediate Reaction

Close burst 5

Trigger: When a creature fails a saving throw against drain soul, at-will

+31 vs Will; 3d8+8 necrotic damage, and the target is immobilized and takes a -2 penalty to saving throws (save ends both).

Acererak's eight soul gems can each hold the soul of one of his victims. At the beginning of an encounter, the soul gems contain three souls. Crushing a gem after Acererak is defeated releases the soul to the Shadowfell.
Acererak's skull (but not the soul gems) crumbles to dust, but Acererak is not destroyed. He reappears in 1 day adjacent to his phylactery, unless the phylactery is also found and destroyed.

system.biography:
HP 1000; Bloodied 500
Regeneration 30 (if Acererak takes radiant damage, regeneration doesn’t function until the end of its next turn)
Resist 15 necrotic, 15 psychic Immune disease, poison, sleep 		Init +20 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 44Fort 39Ref 43Will 42
Speed fly 8 (hover)
Ability ScoresStr 19 (+17)
Con 25 (+20)		Dex 25 (+20)
Int 30 (+23)		Wis 27 (+21)
Cha 21 (+18)
Languages Common
Alignment Evil
Skills Arcana +28, History +25, Insight +26Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 31 | Insight 36
